message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.GT, cs.CE 

This paper deals with the problem of learning to choose actions using contextual information, which is a common problem in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The paper proposes a new solution concept rooted in game theory, which suggests that it is likely to be categorized under cs.GT (Game Theory) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also presents three efficient algorithms for online learning, which suggests that it could be categorized under cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). Finally, the paper deals with the problem of classification, which suggests that it could be categorized under cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science).
